title: Johnson's Farewell Tour
itunes:title: Johnson's Farewell Tour
description:
Bloomberg's Lizzy Burden discusses  Boris Johnson's farewell tour and the new Prime Minister's bulging in tray with anchors Stephen Carroll and Caroline Hepker. Plus: former Bank of England and OBR official Charlie Bean speaks to Bloomberg about the depths of the UK's oncoming recession and how households will need support on the same scale as the pandemic. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
